roleset.name: knowing, aware of
roleset.note: CONSCIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, aware.01. (from conscious.01-j)

example.name: conscious-j: both args
example.text: When-1 I am conscious of typing words into a computer [*-1], I am not aware of the keyboard, of the fact that computers are machines, of the movement of my fingers ...
example.arg: of typing words into a computer

roleset.name: awake from a cognitive/medical standpoint
roleset.note: CONSCIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on FrameNet. (from conscious.02-j)

example.name: conscious-j
example.text: The patient was conscious during the whole proceeding.
